title: Priest

fields.name: Prayer of Violence (x1, Charge 60%):
fields.value: Choose a number "X" between 1 and 4. Your target will be hit by an Astral Attack, with your Attack Score being multiplied by X. However, this attack will be delayed by (X-1) nights. (The Attack Score will always be based on the Night that you submitted this action, regardless of delay.)

fields.name: Piety (x1):
fields.value: All of your pending Prayers will occur 1 night sooner than they otherwise would have, unless would have occurred at the end of this night regardless.

fields.name: Pheonix Feather (Passive, Trigger 70%):
fields.value: Your Defense Power raises to 11x. If you survive an attack that you wouldn't have been able to without this passive, it won't activate again for the rest of the game.

fields.name: Blessing Moon (Passive, Charge 300%):
fields.value: Once Charged, you will gain one more use for Piety, and you will be allowed to use both Piety and Prayer of Violence at once during this night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that only 3 or fewer players are alive, including yourself, and that there are no other living Neutral Killing roles.
